name: aVoiDance (Rubyleehs)
description:
Hi there, this version of the build does not allow you to input your own song, The beat detection and everything else is already setup but I forgot that Unity builds have folder security and you can't just add Audio files to the Resources folder. So I uploaded the game early with some of the audio I been using to test it. I be uploading another version soon that will allow players to add their own song. Sorry! Any feedback would be greatly appreciated too :)

Game made for AGBIC Jam, inspired by this submission for Famicase 2018.

Controls

  • Up/Down/Left/Right and hit it to the beat. Left moves ALL paths with a beat at the time you hit it left and vise versa for Right

Someone asked me to practice my writing too, so you can find out more about me and my journey making the game here!
